data.name: 射鱼鱼
data.detailed_description:
introduction

Simulate the seabed environment to shoot fish, which can shoot and kill more than 10 kinds of fish. Accumulate experience and gold coins in the process of constantly shooting fish. Gold coins can enable you to use more advanced turrets, so as to gain experience faster and improve your level. When the level reaches a certain level, it can unlock all kinds of beauty CG.

features

The game CG up to 20, easy to unlock. It includes a pure and lovely christmas woman, a seductive black silk secretary, a fitness coach with a devil's figure and so on.

You can always find a type suitable for you in this game. What are you waiting for? Your aunt will bring your eagle to unlock it!
data.about_the_game:
introduction

Simulate the seabed environment to shoot fish, which can shoot and kill more than 10 kinds of fish. Accumulate experience and gold coins in the process of constantly shooting fish. Gold coins can enable you to use more advanced turrets, so as to gain experience faster and improve your level. When the level reaches a certain level, it can unlock all kinds of beauty CG.

You can always find a type suitable for you in this game. What are you waiting for? Your aunt will bring your eagle to unlock it!
data.short_description: Relaxing underwater fishing with wonderful music to bring you a different experience!
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: window7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel I3 2500
  • Graphics: GTX 950, AMD R9 280 or newer
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Joshua scs(10K2+XP+W7)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: window10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-9400F CPU @ 2.90GHz 2.90 GHz
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult content and is prohibited for minors.
